title: Person Of Interest Season 5 || Run For Your Life
author: Real Scorsese
comment: OMG...........this is fantastic!  The music choices enhance your scene choices perfectly!  Your editing is phenomenal.  Well done Well done WELL DONE!  Love how you ended it.....with all of them together under the bridge, Hallowed Ground.......wish the series had ended there..........  This video again shows just how much we lost.................
So - and this is how you make a video with mostly fight scenes looking good!
Wow! That was amazing. Gave me chills. Nice work!
John... RUN FOR YOUR LIFE,,, always makes me laugh
description:
The montage on season 5 is available !! 
So you like it? We'll meet for the project finale "21 june 2019" for the 3 years of the series.
